prompt: <description>Part 1 Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with rounded corners. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of -90, 0, -90 and a translation vector of 0, 0, 0. For the sketch, create a new face and add a loop. The loop consists of the following lines: * Line 1: Begin at 0, 0 and end at 0.6318, 0. * Line 2: Begin at 0.6318, 0 and end at 0.75, 0.5332. * Line 3: Begin at 0.75, 0.5332 and end at 0.1478, 0.6667. * Line 4: Begin at 0.1478, 0.6667 and end at 0, 0. Once the sketch is complete, scale it by a factor of 0.75. Extrude the sketch by 0.6388 in the normal direction and 0 in the opposite direction. Use the "NewBodyFeatureOperation" boolean operation. Part 2 Create a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a front face angled at 45 degrees. Begin with a new coordinate system that has euler angles of 0, 0, -77.5 and a translation vector of 0.0313, 0.0068, 0.0305. The sketch should consist of a single face and a loop made up of the following lines: * Line 1: Begin at 0, 0 and end at 0.5763, 0. * Line 2: Begin at 0.5763, 0 and end at 0.5763, 0.6203. * Line 3: Begin at 0.5763, 0.6203 and end at 0, 0.6203. * Line 4: Begin at 0, 0.6203 and end at 0, 0. The sketch should be scaled by a factor of 0.6203. Extrude the sketch by 0 in the normal direction and 0.0441 in the opposite direction. Use the "CutFeatureOperation" boolean operation. Part 3 Create a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The object has a rectangular base and a tapered top. The height of the object is approximately twice the width of the base. Begin with a new coordinate system that has euler angles of 0, 0, -77.5 and a translation vector of 0.0936, 0.0732, 0.1266. The sketch should consist of a single face and a loop made up of a single circle. The circle should be centered at 0.2258, 0.2258 and have a radius of 0.2258. Extrude the sketch by 0.0176 in the normal direction and 0 in the opposite direction. Use the "JoinFeatureOperation" boolean operation. Part 4 Create a simple, rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The front face is angled, creating a unique shape. Begin with a new coordinate system that has euler angles of 0, 0, -77.5 and a translation vector of 0.0313, 0.0498, 0.021. The sketch should consist of a single face and a loop made up of the following lines: * Line 1: Begin at 0, 0 and end at 0.5763, 0. * Line 2: Begin at 0.5763, 0 and end at 0.5763, 0.0441. * Line 3: Begin at 0.5763, 0.0441 and end at 0, 0.0441. * Line 4: Begin at 0, 0.0441 and end at 0, 0. The sketch should be scaled by a factor of 0.5763. Extrude the sketch by 0 in the normal direction and 0.0441 in the opposite direction. Use the "CutFeatureOperation" boolean operation.</description>
